article_title: Steve Beshear blasts Matt Bevin for threatening to end Kynect and roll back Medicaid expansion
article_text: Gov. Steve Beshear sharply criticized Matt Bevin, the Republican who hopes to succeed him, on Tuesday for calling Kynect "a disaster" and pledging to eliminate it if elected next week.

article_metadata.news-keywords: kynect, medicaid, kentucky, health, insurance, steve beshear, matt bevin, beshear, bevin, expand, end, exchange, eliminate, obamacare, federal, affordable care act, governor
